name: Mintplex Labs
headline: Building the all-in-one private desktop AI assistant
description:
Mintplex Labs builds AnythingLLM, an all-in-one desktop AI application that handles everything an LLM should do to increase your productivity while remaining fully private. 

Current tools are:
AnythingLLM (https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm)
VectorAdmin (https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/vector-admin)

generated_description:
**Mintplex Labs Summary**

Mintplex Labs is on a mission to create an all-in-one private desktop AI assistant that enhances productivity while keeping user data secure and private. Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator Batch S22, the company operates out of Irvine, CA, with a compact team of just three employees.

The initial product offering from Mintplex Labs is **AnythingLLM**—a desktop AI application designed to provide optimized utility while ensuring that all processing happens locally, thus safeguarding user privacy. This focus on privacy resonates with businesses looking for AI solutions that they can control. You can find more about AnythingLLM on their [GitHub page](https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm).

In addition to AnythingLLM, Mintplex Labs also develops **VectorAdmin**, a universal interface for managing vector databases, which can be crucial for organizing and utilizing AI-driven data effectively. Check out VectorAdmin [here](https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/vector-admin).

The company is leading the charge in the artificial intelligence space, emphasizing open-source solutions and user empowerment with a hands-on approach to technology. Harj Taggar serves as a Group Partner, bringing invaluable experience and insight to the team.

You can learn more about Mintplex Labs and their innovative products by visiting their official website: [mintplexlabs.com](https://mintplexlabs.com).

In short, Mintplex Labs stands at the intersection of productivity and privacy, proving that powerful AI can integrate seamlessly into our workflows without sacrificing control.
